Local vendor fork of `alacritty_terminal` for Zed.

Origin:
- Repository: `https://github.com/zed-industries/alacritty`
- Crate: `alacritty_terminal`
- Base commit: `9d9640d4e56d67a09d049f9c0a300aae08d4f61e`

Local changes:
- Emits terminal notification events for OSC desktop notification sequences via the vendored `vte` parser.
